about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: A Passionate Developer Creating Digital Excellence

description.desc_1: I'm a dedicated full-stack developer with over 5 years of experience in building modern, responsive, and performant web applications. With expertise in both front-end and back-end technologies, I bridge the gap between design and functionality.
description.desc_2: My journey in technology began with a deep curiosity about how digital products shape our daily lives. This curiosity has evolved into a passion for creating seamless user experiences that not only look beautiful but also function flawlessly.
description.desc_3: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or enjoying outdoor activities to recharge my creative energy.
